targetUrls.title: Target URLs (Posts or Profiles)
targetUrls.description: List of Instagram Post or Profile URLs. Profiles will be expanded to their latest posts.

sessionId.title: Session ID (Required)
sessionId.description: Instagram 'sessionid' cookie value only (not the full cookie string).

sessionCookie.title: Session Cookie (Optional)
sessionCookie.description: Full browser cookie string copied from DevTools (must include sessionid=...). The actor will extract sessionid automatically.

maxComments.title: Max Comments Per Post
maxComments.description: Limit the depth of scraping to save costs.

scrapeSince.title: Delta Mode (Scrape Comments Since)
scrapeSince.description: Only scrape comments posted AFTER this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD or ISO. Leave empty for all.

enrichLeads.title: Enrich High-Intent Leads
enrichLeads.description: If enabled, the actor will visit lead profiles to obtain follower buckets and tiers.

maxPostsPerProfile.title: Max Posts Per Profile
maxPostsPerProfile.description: If a profile URL is provided, scrape this many recent posts.

minLeadScore.title: Minimum Lead Score
minLeadScore.description: Filter output to only include leads at or above this category (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH).

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: Optional webhook URL to receive high-intent leads (leadScore HIGH and intent_score > 0.7).

webhookConfig.title: Webhook Retry Settings (Optional)
webhookConfig.description: Advanced retry/backoff settings for webhook delivery. Leave empty to use defaults.

maxRetries.title: Max Retries
maxRetries.description: Number of retry attempts for failed webhook calls.

baseDelayMs.title: Base Delay (ms)
baseDelayMs.description: Base delay used for exponential backoff in milliseconds.

timeoutMs.title: Request Timeout (ms)
timeoutMs.description: Timeout for webhook HTTP requests in milliseconds.

concurrency.title: Webhook Concurrency
concurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent webhook deliveries.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Apify proxy settings. Leave default to use Apify Proxy.
